thread.title: Did Arsene Wenger send a message to Barcelona at press conference?
thread.title_full: Did Arsene Wenger send a message to Barcelona at press conference?

author: Paul Morrissey
title: Did Arsene Wenger send a message to Barcelona at press conference?
text:
Did Arsene Wenger send a message to Barcelona at press conference?   
Arsene Wenger Situation 
As you surely already know by now, Arsenal were emphatically smashed by Bayern Munich again this week, on a night that was as depressing as it was predictable for Arsenal fans. 
The Gunners went down 5-1 in Bavaria and are undoubtedly out of the competition even before a ball is kicked in the 2nd leg. 
So of course, the Wenger Out Brigade are back out in full force, and the media is focusing in on Arsene’s future, and whether he’ll stay beyond this season. 
The Arsenal board have reportedly tabled a new 2-year contract for Wenger, as his current deal runs out at the end of this season. 
But he’s yet to put pen to paper, and sent a cryptic message at his press conference today, insisting that he would definitely be managing next season –‘ whether that’s at Arsenal or somewhere else.’ Message to Barcelona and PSG? 
So, what exactly did Wenger mean by that? 
Was he suggesting that he may walk away, and that he has some suitors lined up? 
Or was he sending the feelers out to the likes of Barcelona and PSG, as the Mirror claim? 
Barca could well be looking for a new manager in the summer, with Luis Enrique expected to walk/be sacked… Winner Betting Odds
